item.title: Website audit
item.description: Many website owners face the similar challenges sooner or later. Where my website is hosted, who is my domain registrar, do I have any backups, etc. It’s very easy to forget logins, passwords, and all related information to your website mechanics (what’s under the hood). The reason why this is happening is many people focus on their business only rather than website, very few have dedicated “website guy” who takes care of all the logistics.
